name: A Mass of Dead
description: Massacre of zombies! Survive the zombies. Buy and upgrade weapons and equipment to massacre zombies. Kill special zombies like zombie dogs, get unique weapons and equipment that you canâ€™t buy from the shop. Be unbeatable using power boost and massacre zombies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 1.4GHz or faster processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: Resolution 640X480

reviews.review_text: A Woefully boring attempt at a dual stick shooter. There are better free to play games out there, let alone paid games. Skip this one because you're not missing anything.
